SELECT A.USER_NO as userNo, A.USERNAME as username, A.EMAIL as email, A.STATUS as status, B.SALT as salt, B.INS_DT, C.WRKS_NO AS workspaceNo, c.WRKS_ID AS workspaceId, C.AUTH_TP AS workspaceAuth, projectNo, projectId, belongType as projectBelongType, projectAuthType FROM (SELECT * FROM SRV_USR_MST WHERE STATUS = '100-002') A JOIN (SELECT * FROM SRV_USR_SESS WHERE SESS_KEY = #{sess_auth_key}) B ON A.USER_NO = B.USER_NO JOIN (SELECT A.WRKS_NO, A.WRKS_ID, B.USER_NO, B.AUTH_TP, B.STATUS FROM (SELECT * FROM SRV_WRKS_MST WHERE WRKS_ID = #{sess_workspace_id}) A JOIN SRV_WRKS_MEM B ON A.WRKS_NO = B.WRKS_NO WHERE B.STATUS = '100-002') C ON B.USER_NO = C.USER_NO JOIN (SELECT A.PRJT_NO AS projectNo, A.PRJT_ID AS projectId, A.BELONG_TP AS belongType, B.AUTH_TP AS projectAuthType, B.USER_NO FROM (SELECT * FROM SRV_PRJT_MST WHERE PRJT_ID = #{sess_project_id}) A JOIN SRV_PRJT_MEM B ON A.PRJT_NO = B.PRJT_NO WHERE B.STATUS = '100-002') D ON B.USER_NO = D.USER_NO
